summary: This document is a certification of good standing for the corporation Southern Trust Company, Inc., formerly known as Financial Informatics, Inc., issued by the Office of the Lieutenant Governor in the Virgin Islands. It confirms that the corporation is authorized to conduct business and is in good standing as of the date of the certification.

persons.name: Denise Johannes
persons.context: Denise Johannes is identified as the Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks, who issued the certification of good standing for Southern Trust Company, Inc.

events.title: Articles of Incorporation Filed
events.description: Southern Trust Company, Inc. filed its Articles of Incorporation with the Office of the Lieutenant Governor.

events.title: Certificate of Incorporation Issued
events.description: A Certificate of Incorporation was issued by the Lieutenant Governor authorizing Southern Trust Company, Inc. to conduct business.

locations: 5049 Kongens Gado, Charlotte Amalie, Virgin Islands, 00802
105 King Street, Christiansted, Virgin Islands, C0820
keyFacts: The document certifies that Southern Trust Company, Inc. is in good standing.
The corporation was formerly known as Financial Informatics, Inc.
The Articles of Incorporation were filed on November 18, 2011.
A Certificate of Incorporation was issued on December 8, 2011.
The certification was issued by Denise Johannes, Director of the Division of Corporations and Trademarks.
